title: Matchsafe, ""Diamond Match Company, Ltd."", ca. 1900
provenance: Collection of Carol B. Brener and Stephen W. Brener
creditline: Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener
description: Rectangular, upper part curved with bands that run from front to back, cover opens on front, thumb catch at bottom, cover inscribed in a circle "The Diamond Match Co. Ltd.", "T" and "C" inscribed on corners outside of circle. Striker on bottom beneath thumb catch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Matchsafe, ""Diamond Match Company, Ltd."", ca. 1900.
ca. 1900. Plated tin, gilded. Gift of Stephen W. Brener and Carol B. Brener. 1980-14-1253.
